name: Bronzong
author: Naoki Saito
flavor_text: Ancient people believed that petitioning Bronzong for rain was the way to make crops grow.

abilities.name: Metal Fortress
abilities.effect: Prevent all effects of your opponent’s attacks, including damage, done to your Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Guard Press
attacks.effect: During your opponent’s next turn, any damage done to this Pokémon by attacks is reduced by 20 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).
